TextView.android:text:
1. Welcome to NAYAN, an application designed to assist blind individuals. Please follow the instructions carefully to make the most of your experience.

2. Left Swipe (Currency Summing): To sum the currency notes, swipe left on the screen with your finger.

3. Right Swipe (Text-to-Speech Conversion): To convert text to speech, swipe right on the screen with your finger. This action will activate the text-to-speech feature.

4. Up Swipe (Currency Note Identification): To identify currency notes, swipe up on the screen with your finger. This action will activate the currency note identification feature.
